name: .DVL File Extension
summary: Learn about .DVL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A DVL file is a digital publication format similar to .PDF. It is a proprietary format used by Dalim Virtual Library (DVL) for iOS. A DVL file contains one or more pages that may include both text and images. The format also supports links, bookmarks, videos, and slideshows.

content: Dalim Software is a graphics software company based in Germany. Other Dalim publishing programs include TWiST, MiSTRAL, LiTHO, PRiNTEMPO, and DiALOGUE.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
